languages.text: "Достойн{mf|ый|ая} и несгбимаем{mf|ый|ая} — несмотря на тяжелую ношу власти. Но вы же помните, шерин, что Джай Хейдари всегда к вашим услугам? Партнеры для того и существуют, чтобы делить тяжкое бремя друг друга".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Достойный и несгбимаемый — несмотря на тяжелую ношу власти. Но помните, шерин, я всегда рядом. Друзья ведь для того и существуют, чтобы делить бремя на двоих". {n}Джай одаривает вас самой очаровательной из улыбок.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Worthy and unyielding even under the heavy burden of power. But surely you remember, shereen, that Jae Heydari is always at your service? That is what partners are for: to share their heavy burdens between them."
languages.original_text: "Достойн{mf|ый|ая} и несгбимаем{mf|ый|ая} — несмотря на тяжелую ношу власти. Но вы же помните, шерин, что Джай Хейдари всегда к вашим услугам? Партнеры для того и существуют, чтобы делить тяжкое бремя друг друга".

traits.locale_text: "Worthy and unyielding even under the heavy burden of power. But surely you remember, shereen, that Jae Heydari is always at your service? That is what partners are for — to share heavy burdens with each other."

"Worthy and unyielding even under the heavy burden of power. But surely you remember, shereen, that Jae Heydari is always at your service? That is what partners are for — to share heavy burdens with each other."

"Worthy and unyielding even under the heavy burden of power. But surely, you remember, shereen, that Jae Heydari is always at your service? That is what partners are for: to share their heavy burdens between them."

"Worthy and unyielding even under the heavy burden of power. But surely, you remember, shereen, that Jae Heydari is always at your service? That is what partners are for: to share their heavy burdens between them."

"Worthy and unyielding even under the heavy burden of power. But surely you remember, shereen, that Jae Heydari is always at your service? That is what partners are for: to share their heavy burdens between them."

"Worthy and unyielding even under the heavy burden of power. But surely you remember, shereen, that Jae Heydari is always at your service? That is what partners are for: to share their heavy burdens between them."

languages.text: "Würdig und unnachgiebig, selbst unter der schweren Bürde der Macht. Aber Ihr wisst sicher noch, Shereen, dass Jae Heydari immer zu Euren Diensten steht? Dafür sind Partner da: schwere Bürden zu teilen."
languages.original_text: "Worthy and unyielding even under the heavy burden of power. But surely you remember, shereen, that Jae Heydari is always at your service? That is what partners are for: to share their heavy burdens between them."

traits.locale_text: "Würdig und unnachgiebig, selbst unter der schweren Bürde der Macht. Aber Ihr wisst sicher noch, Shereen, dass Jae Heydari immer zu Euren Diensten steht? Dafür sind Partner da: schwere Bürden zu teilen."

languages.text: « Digne et inflexible, même en portant le lourd fardeau du pouvoir. Mais n'oubliez pas, shereen, que Jae Heydari est toujours à vos côtés. C'est à ça que servent les partenaires : à alléger les lourds fardeaux. »
languages.original_text: "Worthy and unyielding even under the heavy burden of power. But surely you remember, shereen, that Jae Heydari is always at your service? That is what partners are for: to share their heavy burdens between them."

traits.locale_text: « Digne et inflexible, même en portant le lourd fardeau du pouvoir. Mais n'oubliez pas, shereen, que Jae Heydari est toujours à vos côtés. C'est à ça que servent les partenaires : à alléger les lourds fardeaux. »

languages.text: “即便是在权力的重担下，也依然坚韧不拔，这很值得尊重。不过，亲爱的，婕伊·海达利始终愿意为你效力，你应该不会忘吧？伙伴存在的意义，就是共同分担彼此的重担。”
languages.original_text: "Worthy and unyielding even under the heavy burden of power. But surely you remember, shereen, that Jae Heydari is always at your service? That is what partners are for: to share their heavy burdens between them."

traits.locale_text: “即便是在权力的重担下，也依然坚韧不拔，这很值得尊重。不过，亲爱的，婕伊·海达利始终愿意为你效力，你应该不会忘吧？伙伴存在的意义，就是共同分担彼此的重担。”

languages.text: «Dign{mf|o|a} e inflexible incluso bajo la pesada carga del poder. Aun así recordará que Jae Heydari está siempre a su servicio, ¿verdad, shereen? Para eso están los compañeros: para compartir las cargas».
languages.original_text: "Worthy and unyielding even under the heavy burden of power. But surely you remember, shereen, that Jae Heydari is always at your service? That is what partners are for: to share their heavy burdens between them."

traits.locale_text: «Dign{mf|o|a} e inflexible incluso bajo la pesada carga del poder. Aun así recordará que Jae Heydari está siempre a su servicio, ¿verdad, shereen? Para eso están los compañeros: para compartir las cargas».

languages.text: 「力の重圧の下でも、価値があって、屈することがない。でもね、シェリーン。ジェイ・ヘイダリがいつだってアンタのために仕えていることを、アンタは覚えているでしょ？お互いに重荷を分かち合うのがパートナーってもんよ」
languages.original_text: "Worthy and unyielding even under the heavy burden of power. But surely you remember, shereen, that Jae Heydari is always at your service? That is what partners are for: to share their heavy burdens between them."

traits.locale_text: 「力の重圧の下でも、価値があって、屈することがない。でもね、シェリーン。ジェイ・ヘイダリがいつだってアンタのために仕えていることを、アンタは覚えているでしょ？お互いに重荷を分かち合うのがパートナーってもんよ」

languages.text: "Gücün ağır yükü altında bile değerli ve yılmaz... Hatırlıyor olmalısın şirinim... Jae Heydari her zaman hizmetinde. Ortaklar, ağır yüklerini aralarında paylaştırmak içindir."
languages.original_text: "Worthy and unyielding even under the heavy burden of power. But surely you remember, shereen, that Jae Heydari is always at your service? That is what partners are for: to share their heavy burdens between them."

traits.locale_text: "Gücün ağır yükü altında bile değerli ve yılmaz... Hatırlıyor olmalısın şirinim, Jae Heydari her zaman hizmetinizde, değil mi? Ortaklar, ağır yüklerini aralarında paylaştırmak içindir."
